title: Large Scale Probabilistic Simulation of Business Processes
description: Large Scale Probabilistic Simulation of Business Processes. In the project we want to leverage our vast amount of transactional data plus state of the art ML approaches to create tomorrow's technologies for AI enabled development and testing of steering applications.
